location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 95 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'a'; '17'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View along the shore at Linga [Lingeh]. At right, two camels are being led along the shore, loaded with large bundles. In the background, at left at least six dhows and other boats are pulled up along the shore. Buildings recede into the distance.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Linga’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘a’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘17’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘(Jan. 1918)’
